UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: A Simplified Derivative of Human Defensin 5 with Potent and Efficient Activity against Multidrug-Resistant Acinetobacter baumannii.
Literature.Author: Wang C, Zhao G, Wang S, Chen Y, Gong Y, Chen S, Xu Y, Hu M, Wang X, Zeng H, Wang A, Liu D, Su Y, Cheng T, Chen F, Wang J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:30% Hemolysis=25 µg/ml,Mouse erythrocytes:42% Hemolysis=50 µg/ml,Mouse erythrocytes:65% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml,Human keratinocytes HaCat:5% Killing=150 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=40µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=40µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(LD50=<1.56µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(LD90=2.8±0.7µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(0-10% Killing=12.5µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(0-10% Killing=12.5µg/ml)
